rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall with a foyer that welcomes guests. Vastu-aligned entrance placement.
Open living space with modern decor, natural light through large windows, and a view of the front garden.
Contemporary kitchen with modular cabinets and modern appliances. Positioned according to Vastu for auspicious energy.
Open dining area integrated with living room, offering a seamless flow between spaces and natural ventilation.
Compact servant quarters designed for convenience and privacy. Includes basic amenities and storage space.

openings.description: Large, inviting entrance door with glass accents. Aligned according to Vastu for positive energy flow.
Glass windows providing ample natural light and ventilation, enhancing the modern aesthetic of the living room.
An opening that connects the kitchen with the dining area for easy food transfer during meals.
